articles.content: Sam Kerr's dream of sealing her triumphant season for Chelsea with a Women's Champions League victory has turned into a nightmare as brilliant Barcelona outclassed the English champions 4-0 in the fi… [+2225 chars]

articles.title: Atleti's La Liga title hopes in own hands after Suarez strike sinks Osasuna - The World Game
articles.description: Luis Suarez scored an 88th-minute winner to earn Atletico Madrid a dramatic 2-1 comeback win over Osasuna that keeps their La Liga title hopes in their own hands heading into the final matchday.
articles.content: Their dreams of a first title since the 2013-14 season appeared to have suffered a damaging blow 15 minutes from full-time when Ante Budimir struck completely against the run of play in Monday's (AES… [+1529 chars]

articles.title: Super Rugby: Crusaders not fooled by depleted Reds' limp loss to Highlanders - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: Crusaders 'chasing points' against champion Reds after coughing up an all-important bonus point against the Brumbies.
articles.content:
Scott Robertson wasnt bluffed by the Reds limp 40-19 defeat to the Highlanders in Dunedin last weekend.
 The Crusaders head coach expects a vastly different team to front against them in Brisbane on… [+4228 chars]
